description: Queries involving multiple tables with JOIN operations

examples.prompt: Get airport with geographic details by IATA code JFK
examples.sql: SELECT a.airport_id, a.iata, a.icao, a.name, ag.city, ag.country, ag.latitude, ag.longitude FROM airport a LEFT JOIN airport_geo ag ON a.airport_id = ag.airport_id WHERE a.iata = 'JFK'

examples.prompt: Get passenger with their contact details by ID 1000
examples.sql: SELECT p.passenger_id, p.passportno, p.firstname, p.lastname, pd.birthdate, pd.sex, pd.city, pd.country, pd.emailaddress, pd.telephoneno FROM passenger p LEFT JOIN passengerdetails pd ON p.passenger_id = pd.passenger_id WHERE p.passenger_id = 1000

examples.prompt: Get flight with airline information for flight ID 115
examples.sql: SELECT f.flight_id, f.flightno, f.departure, f.arrival, a.airlinename, a.iata as airline_code FROM flight f INNER JOIN airline a ON f.airline_id = a.airline_id WHERE f.flight_id = 115
